Atomic vector extent

Coerce a extent to an atomic vector of c(xmin(x), xmax(x), ymin(x), ymax(x)).

as_double(x, ...)

# S3 method for Extent
as_double(x, ...)

as_integer(x, ...)

# S3 method for Extent
as_integer(x, ...)

Arguments

x

a extent
...

unused

Value

numeric vector

Details

Note that as_integer results in truncation, see rasterOps for positive buffering.

See also

base::as.double
